Andy Coulson denies being aware of any wrongdoing at the paper, part of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp media group, and police said last month there was not enough evidence to charge him with any crime. Obviously when he was editor of the News of the World, bad things happened at that newspaper and when he found about those, he resigned. again asserted his innocence. Since then, the scandal hasn't died, mostly because Andy Coulson 's evasions strain credulity. The shirky wording of the statement he issued today does not exactly enhance his reputation for straightforwardness. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role, Andy Coulson said.
